title: MD Renamer v1.1 Program for tidying filenames
description:
This slightly newer release has some excellent improvements to the renaming algorithm.

MD Renamer is a simple yet effective application for tidying up the filenames 
of all files in a folder. This is particularily useful when downloading a 
series of files from the internet, where typically people replace spaces in 
the filenames with the underscore character or leave everything in lowercase. 

MD Renamer will attempt to automatically tidy the names, but with a little user 
intervention is literally able to save hours of renaming. 

For example, a typical downloaded filename might be in the format: 
01_-_MD_Multimedia_-_Intro_Track_[www.mdmultimedia.pwp.blueyonder.co.uk].mp3 

And the intended output filename could be: 
01 - Md Multimdeia - Intro Track.mp3 

This application will enable you to clean this filename and all of the 
similarily named files in a folder. 

For more information visit:  <a href="
http://www.mdmultimedia.pwp.blueyonder.co.uk" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.mdmultimedia.pwp.blueyonder.co.uk</a>
